name: STIRRI LF HF
description: STIRRI LF HF™ is a versatile solder paste and tacky flux combination suitable for stencil applications. It is formulated to be halogen-free, meeting regulatory standards such as REACH (Europe). With its rosin-based composition, STIRRI LF HF™ offers reliable performance for various soldering tasks. Whether you're a professional or a hobbyist, this product provides consistent results without compromising environmental safety.
